title: $400 off second months rent
posting_body: ['Bedford OaksWithin Bedford prime location, you have discovered a private community designed especially for people who desire a neighborhood lifestyle.', 'A place where friends and family meet and enjoy outdoor activities, convenient location, inspiring views and a gorgeous home.', 'We strike the balance between lavish and reasonable, with high-end interior upgrades, at a price that allows you to sleep well at night.', 'Our classic-meets-modern style ensures you will feel pampered, and at home.', 'Bedford Oaks professional management and maintenance team are dedicated to providing you with the highest level of service.', 'Our commitment is to exceed your expectations each and every day.', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183', '-Fitness Center', '-On-Site Management', '-Cable Ready', '-Sundeck', '-Pool', '-Air Conditioner', '-Window Coverings', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', '-Large Closets', '-Free Weights', '-Hardwood Floors', '-W/D Hookup', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
